description: Detects a Powershell process that contains download commands in its command line string Author: Florian Roth, oscd.community, Jonhnathan Ribeiro. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: PowerShell Download from URL
query: (process.executable:*\\powershell.exe AND process.command_line:*new\-object* AND process.command_line:*net.webclient\).* AND process.command_line:*download* AND process.command_line:(*string\(* OR *file\(*))
